info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:24AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Joseph, northeastern La Porte, southwestern Cass and southeastern Berrien Counties through 200 AM EDT/100 AM CDT/... At 123 AM EDT/1223 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Three Oaks, or 12 miles west of Buchanan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Bend, Mishawaka, Niles, Buchanan, Georgetown, Granger, Osceola, New Buffalo, Three Oaks, Edwardsburg, Roseland, Shorewood-Tower Hill, Shorewood-Tower Hills-Harbert, Bertrand, Dayton, Galien, Indian Village, Union Pier, Glendora and New Troy. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 58 and 86. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 2 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
